about_the_game:
As our game is still in development, there may be changes or additions to the visuals. Therefore, please note that some features and visuals may change before the full version of the game is released. Throughout our development process, we are working to add new features and content to the game and taking feedback from our players into consideration. By following our game, you can join us in the development process and be prepared for the full release of our game.
We will be releasing a demo for our game, which is still in development, soon. If you'd like to be notified when the demo is available, please don't forget to add our game to your Wishlist!






Valdoron was an ancient kingdom that had lived in peace and prosperity for many years. However, everything changed with the attack of dark evils coming from the east. The kingdom's cities were falling one by one, people were dying, and even the dead were fighting for the darkness, as evil spirits were blown into their bodies.

Even the last defense line, Zalbanor city, fell, most of the king and his people were killed or captured. Andur, the exiled heir of the kingdom, learned about the news while wandering in the northern lands and immediately took action. His goal was to rebuild his kingdom and defeat his enemies.

However, the evils that Andur faced were much greater than he thought. Witnessing the brutality of war, Andur had to fight against a vast enemy that would cross his own borders and also struggle with the darkness within himself.

As Andur gathered his courage and strength to save his kingdom, every step he took turned into a struggle for survival. While entering into a great battle to defeat the ruthless enemies of the Valdoron Kingdom, Andur experienced the difficulty of fighting against the forces of darkness. In this battle, Andur would not only save a kingdom, but also save himself




Single Character: The game features a single main character, and players must control the entire game through this character.
Combat Abilities: There are 4 different combat abilities in the game that can provide advantages to players when used correctly.
Souls: A resource that players earn by defeating creatures and bosses. Souls can be used for weapon upgrades and ability enhancements.
Bosses: Players must defeat bosses to progress through the levels. Bosses are more powerful and require more challenging battles.
Weapon Upgrades: Souls allow players to upgrade their weapons, providing them with an advantage.
Ability Enhancements: Souls also allow players to enhance their health, defense, damage, and energy."
